headline: Defensive by Design: How Kimberly-Clark is Weathering the Tariff Storm
summary: Kimberly‑Clark Corporation (NASDAQ:KMB) is one of the best trade‑war resistant stocks to buy now. On July 25, 2025, JPMorgan analyst Andrea Teixeira maintained her Underweight rating on KMB while cutting the price target from $126 to $125, citing persistent trade‑tariff pressures and margin constraints that could limit near‑term upside potential. That caution is well‑grounded. In April 2025, […]
